name: Tadasana
instructions: Start at the top of your mat with your hands at your sides.

name: Urdhva Vrikshasana
instructions: Breathe in, and raise your arms above your head.

name: Uttanasana A
instructions: Exhale, fold forward, and bring your hands to the floor.

name: Uttanasana B
instructions: Inhale, ground your hands and look halfway up.

name: Chaturanga Dandasana
instructions: Exhale, plant your hands, float back, elbows close to sides, lower halfway down.

name: Urdhva Mukha Shvanasana
instructions: Inhale, straighten your arms, open your chest, upward facing dog.

name: Adho Mukha Shvanasana
instructions: Exhale, tuck your toes, push back, lifting the sits bones, and straighten your arms. Downward facing dog.

name: Uttanasana B
instructions: Inhale, come to the front of your mat, and look halfway up with a flat back.

name: Uttanasana A
instructions: Exhale, fold forward, bringing your head to your knees.

name: Urdhva Vrikshasana
instructions: Inhale, rise up, bringing your arms overhead.

name: Tadasana
instructions: Exhale, bring your hands to heart's center.
